text.style: fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Cousine; font-size: 670px; paint-order: fill; stroke: rgb(186, 218, 85); white-space: pre; visibility: hidden;

path.style: fill: none; stroke-width: 12px; stroke: url(#color-0); stroke-dasharray: 32; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dashoffset: 12px;
fill: none; stroke-width: 12px; stroke: url(#color-0); stroke-dasharray: 32; stroke-linecap: round;
